==Images==
[[File:Nimt1.jpg|left|thumb|800px|View of academic block of NIMT, greater Noida.]]
==Campuses== [[File:Nimt location.jpg|right|thumb|300px|NIMT locations]] NIMT organisation is based in north India. It has its campuses in greater Noida, Delhi, Ghaziabad,<ref name="directory">[http://books.google.com/books?hl=en&lr=&id=Wgfh7kAi8_wC&oi=fnd&pg=PA9&dq=nimt++ghaziabad&ots=nik5VNzoCW&sig=QpvsLgCxcgXBHeUXKxcJSUAL79A#v=onepage&q=nimt%20%20ghaziabad&f=false directory] book</ref> Jaipur, and Kotputli (Rajasthan).
NIMT has five campuses across three states: The first three are in Ghaziabad at Mohan Nagar, Ansals Avantika and Ansals Avantika extension. A fourth campus is in greater Noida and the fifth is in Kotputli (Rajasthan).
NIMT has been conceptualized as a centre for corporate excellence. The NIMT greater Noida campus is primarily for international education.
Beside this NIMT organisation has its head offices in Jaipur and Delhi.
==Academic programmes== ===Undergraduate degree programs=== * Bachelor of Technology * Bachelor of Pharmacy * Bachelors in Hotel Management and catering Technology * Bachelor in Physiotherapy * Bachelor of science in Radiology * Bachelor in Physiotherapy * Bachelor of science in Nursing * General Nursing and Midwifery
===Diploma programs=== * Diploma operation theatre technician * Diploma in Physiotherapy
===Postgraduate programs=== * Postgraduate diploma in management (PGDM) * Masters of Business administration (MBA)
==Services for students==
* Hostel facility * Transportation * Campus clinic * Sports facilities * Physiotherapy clinic * Career counseling * Banks * Loan facility * Library * Cafe and kiosks * Computing services * Information technology support
==Ranking== NIMT Group of Institutions has consistently been ranked in A+ business schools in India. The Ghaziabad and greater Noida campuses have ranked among the top 10 while the rest are under top 20.<ref name="b i ranking">[http://www.nimtgroup.org/ranking.html 2008 ranking]</ref><ref name="business india ranking 2008">[http://www.bibschoolsurvey.com/Survey%202008/BS%20Ranking%20Rating.pdf BI survey]</ref><ref name="business india ranking ">[http://www.bibschoolsurvey.com/html/survey2001Ranking.htm 2001 ranking]</ref>
